section.heading: Therapeutic family home program for youth in custody under chapter 13.34 RCW

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.13 > Section 74.13.170 74.13.110 << 74.13.170 >> 74.13.232 PDF RCW 74.13.170 Therapeutic family home program for youth in custody under chapter 13.34 RCW. The department may, through performance-based contracts with agencies, implement a therapeutic family home program for up to fifteen youth in the custody of the department under chapter 13.34 RCW. The program shall strive to develop and maintain a mutually reinforcing relationship between the youth and the therapeutic staff associated with the program. [ 2018 c 284 s 44 ; 2009 c 520 s 70 ; 1991 c 326 s 2 .]
